roleset.name: to leave out, exclude
roleset.note: EXCEPT-V NOTES: Roleset created after original was overwritten. Framed by Claire. (from except.01-v)
EXCEPTION-N NOTES: Framed by anwen april 2011 (based on exclude.01) (from exception.01-n)

roles.note: "Horses are the exception to the rule" is not an eventive usage. 'exception' here is its own arg1 (no good) (from exception.01-n)

example.name: Passive, arg1 only
example.text: An admission fee is charged, but children-1 are excepted *-1.

example.name: All args, historical document
example.text: Twas with this View that he excepted them from Service in the Wars, but permitted to take Arms for their own Defence.

example.name: All args
example.text: Coach's exception of Nina from the mandatory dodgeball game was because of her knee injury.

roleset.name: to object, legal domain
roleset.note: EXCEPT-V NOTES: Roleset based on dictionary overview of except, replacement frame file. Framed by Claire (from except.02-v)

example.name: All args, typical usage
example.text: Counsel excepted to the court's ruling.
